# Gemoji

## After

Thumbs up: 👍, thumbs down: 👎.

:other😄. 😄other:

Emoji w/ multiple names: 😆, 😆

Joined?  😄smile:.

Adjacent?  😄😄.

Families: 👨‍👨‍👦‍👦

Long flags: 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁷󠁬󠁳󠁿, 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁳󠁣󠁴󠁿, 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁥󠁮󠁧󠁿.

In *😷* emphasis.

In **😷** strong.

In [😷](#) a link (resource).

In [😷][x] a link (reference).

In ![:mask:](#) an image (resource).

In ![:mask:][x] an image (reference).

In [x](https://:mask:) a destination.

In [x](x ":mask:") a title.

```:mask: in the info
```

```in the :mask: meta
```

[x]: #
